sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Filing of Copies Act.

sections.heading: Subject to the provisions of Sections 2, 3 and 4 of this Act,
sections.text:
reproduced copies of the following forms, reports and schedules may be
filed in lieu of the original copy:

sections.heading: In order to be acceptable for filing, reproduced copies shall
Only one side of the reproduction paper need be used; however, when
sections.text:
practicable, both sides, resulting in the same page arrangement as the
official form, shall be used.

sections.heading: Reproduction of forms may be made after insertion of the required
sections.text:
information; however, all signatures shall be original signatures, affixed
subsequent to the reproduction process.

sections.heading: Prior approval of reproduction of forms need not be obtained from
sections.text:
the governmental agency with which the report is required to be filed, if
the conditions of Sections 2, 3 and 4 are complied with. If prior
approval is desired, a sample of the proposed reproduction shall be
delivered to the agency involved, and such agency shall approve the
reproduction, if the conditions of Sections 2, 3 and 4 are complied with.
